quotes.message: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
quotes.name: Doug Larson

quotes.message: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
quotes.name: Len Wein

quotes.message: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.name: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.message: True friends are those who came into your life, saw the most negative part of you, but are not ready to leave you, no matter how contagious you are to them.
quotes.name: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.message: True friends can communicate with their eyes.
quotes.name: Mary Rose Magnaye

quotes.message: True friends are not mirrors where we can always see ourselves reflected in a positive light.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: The friend who holds your hand and says the wrong thing is made of dearer stuff than the one who stays away.
quotes.name: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.message: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Only your real friends will tell you when your face is dirty.
quotes.name: Sicilian Proverb

quotes.message: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.name: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.message: The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.name: Arnold Glasow

quotes.message: Cherish the friend who tells you a harsh truth, wanting ten times more to tell you a loving lie.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: A friend can tell you things you don't want to tell yourself.
quotes.name: Frances Ward Weller

quotes.message: It's the ones you can call up at 4:00 a.m. that really matter.
quotes.name: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.message: 10. A friend shares the good times and helps out by listening during the bad times.
quotes.name: Molly Oliver

quotes.message: A true friend is someone you can disagree with and still remain friends. For if not, they weren't true friends in the first place.
quotes.name: Sandy Ratliff

quotes.message: A true friend encourages us, comforts us, supports us like a big easy chair, offering us a safe refuge from the world.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
quotes.name: Donna Roberts

quotes.message: Ah, how good it feels! The hand of an old friend.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.
quotes.name: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.message: Our most difficult task as a friend is to offer understanding when we don't understand.
quotes.name: Robert Brault

quotes.message: Tell me something only you know and make a new friend.
quotes.name: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.message: What draws people to be friends is that they see the same truth. They share it.
quotes.name: C.S. Lewis

quotes.message: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Foley

quotes.message: When a friend is in trouble, don't annoy him by asking if there is anything you can do. Think up something appropriate and do it.
quotes.name: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.message: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
quotes.name: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.message: One friend in a lifetime is much; two are many; three are hardly possible.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: The essence of true friends is to make allowances for another's little lapses.
quotes.name: David Storey

quotes.message: We need old friends to help us grow old and new friends to help us stay young.
quotes.name: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.message: A friend is one who knows us, but loves us anyway.
quotes.name: Jerome Cummings

quotes.message: Never shall I forget the days I spent with you. Continue to be my friend, as you will always find me yours.
quotes.name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.message: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.name: A. A. Milne

quotes.message: Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them your smile, your hope, and your courage.
quotes.name: Doe Zantamata

quotes.message: Are we not like two volumes of one book?
quotes.name: Marceline Desbordes-Valmore

quotes.message: We have been friends together In sunshine and in shade.
quotes.name: Caroline Sheridan Norton

quotes.message: We all take different paths in life, but no matter where we go, we take a little of each other everywhere.
quotes.name: Tim McGraw

quotes.message: Surround yourself only with people who are going to lift you higher.
quotes.name: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.message: Friends are born, not made.
quotes.name: Henry Adams

quotes.message: Man's best friend is one who wishes well to the object of his wish for his sake, even if no one is to know of it.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: A sure friend is known in unsure circumstances.
quotes.name: Quintus Ennius

quotes.message: Have friends, not for the sake of receiving, but of giving.
quotes.name: Joseph Roux

quotes.message: Our triumphs seem hollow unless we have friends to share them, and our failures are made bearable by their understanding.
quotes.name: James Rachels
